songs.title: You Keep Me Hangin’ On
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: All]
Set me free, why don't you, babe?
Get out my life, why don't you, babe?
Cause you don't really love me
You just keep me hanging on

[Verse 1: Jade]
Why do you keep coming around playing with my heart?
Why don't you get out of my life
And let me make a new start?
Let me get over you the way you've gotten over me, yeah

[Chorus: All]
Set me free, why don't you, babe?
Get out my life, why don't you, babe?
Cause you don't really love me
You just keep me hanging on

[Verse 2: Leigh-Anne]
You say although we broke up
You still wanna be just friends
But how can we still be friends when you just my heart again?
And there ain't nothing I can do about it

[Bridge: Perrie]
You claim you still care for me
Your heart and soul needs to be free
Let me get over you
The way you've gotten over me, yeah

[Chorus: All]
Set me free, why don't you, babe?
Get out my life, why don't you, babe?
Cause you don't really love me
You just keep me hanging on
Cause you don't really love me
You just keep me hanging on
